HI

here.

making projects

Paul


--- "Anthony J. Bryant" <ajbryant@...> wrote:


---------------------------------
gingerdarbini wrote:

> 
> I work at a high school and I am trying to find
someone who would be 
> willing to be interviewed by a high school student
by phone for about 
> 20 minutes.  The student is taking a class which he
studies the topic 
> of his choice for the entire school year.  One of
the assignments is 
> to interview someone knowledgeable about the topic. 
He is studying 
> the lifestyles and ways of the samurai and ninja and
their effect on 
> the feudal history of Japan.
> 
> Is anyone interested in this request? Thanks!

Sure, I'd be glad to help. Drop me an e-mail.

Tony
